This function extract stats for each directional bins

common_statistics(mag=['mag'], drr='drr', args={'Minimum occurrence (main direction) [%]': 15, 'Time blocking': {'North hemishere(Summer/Winter)': False, 'North hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'North hemisphere moosoon(SW,NE,Hot season)': False, 'South hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'South hemisphere(Summer/Winter)': False, 'Yearly': True}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs'})[source]¶

function to output comparison stat between measured and predicted data i.e BIAS,MAE,RMSE,MRAE

excedence_coincidence_probability(data='data', coincident_nodir='coincident_nodir', coincident_with_dir='coincident_with_dir', args={'Coincidence bins: Min Res Max(optional)': [0, 2], 'Direction binning': {'centered': True, 'not-centered': False}, 'Direction interval': 45.0, 'Duration Min Res Max': [6, 6, 72], 'Exceedance bins: Min Res Max(optional)': [0, 2], 'Time blocking': {'Annual': True, 'Monthly': False, 'Seasonal (North hemisphere)': False, 'Seasonal (South hemisphere)': False}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'method': {'exceedence': True, 'non-exceedence': False}})[source]¶

Exceedence and non-exceedence analysis co-incident with another parameter, similar to Joint-probability function but includes a cumulative sum to obtain exceedence or non-exceedence(in %).

exceedence_probability(data='data', args={'Duration Min Res Max': [6, 6, 72], 'Exceedance bins: Min Res Max(optional)': [2, 1, 22], 'Time blocking': {'Annual': True, 'Monthly': False, 'Seasonal (North hemisphere)': False, 'Seasonal (South hemisphere)': False}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'method': {'exceedence': False, 'non-exceedence': False, 'persistence exceedence': True, 'persistence non-exceedence': False}})[source]¶

This function calculates the frequency of occurrence of data: -exceeding specific values (exceedence) -non-exceeding specific values (non-exceedence) -exceeding specific values during a specific duration (persistence exceedence) -non-exceeding specific values during a specific duration (persistence non-exceedence)

joint_probability(speed='speed', direction='direction', period='period', args={'Direction binning': {'centered': True, 'not-centered': False}, 'Direction interval': 45.0, 'Probablity expressed in': {'per thoushand': True, 'percent': False}, 'Time blocking': {'Annual': True, 'Monthly': False, 'Seasonal (North hemisphere)': False, 'Seasonal (South hemisphere)': False}, 'X Min Res Max(optional)': [2, 1, 22], 'Y Min Res Max(optional)': [0, 0.5], 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'method': {'Mag vs Dir': True, 'Mag vs Per': False, 'Per Vs Dir': False}})[source]¶

This function provides joint distribution tables for X and Y, i.e. the probability of events defined in terms of both X and Y (per 1000) It can be applied for magnitude-direction, magnitude-period or period-direction

modal_wave_period(Hs='Hs', Tp='Tp', args={'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'type': {'North hemishere(Summer/Winter)': False, 'North hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'North hemisphere moosoon(SW,NE,Hot season)': False, 'South hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'South hemisphere(Summer/Winter)': True}})[source]¶

This function computes the modal period for a set of hs/tp The modal period is taken as the mean period of the top 5% of wave height

wave_population(Hs='Hs', Tm02='Tm02', Drr_optional='Drr_optional', Tp_optional='Tp_optional', SW_optional='SW', args={'Direction binning': {'centered': True, 'not-centered': False}, 'Direction interval': 45.0, 'Directional switch': {'Off': False, 'On': True}, 'Exposure (years) (= length of time series if not specified)': 0, 'Heigh bin size': 0.5, 'Method': {'Height only': True, 'Height/Direction': False, 'Height/Tp': False, 'Height/period': False}, 'Period bin size': 2, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs'})[source]¶

This function computes the wave population for fatigue analysis - Based on Rayleigh distribution if spectral width parameter (SW) is not

specified.

  • Based on Longuet-Higgins Hs-Tp joint probability distribution if SW is specified

weather_window(data='data', args={'Duration Min Res Max': [6, 6, 72], 'Exceedance bins: Min Res Max(optional)': [2, 1, 22], 'Time blocking': {'Annual': True, 'Monthly': False, 'Seasonal (North hemisphere)': False, 'Seasonal (South hemisphere)': False}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'method': {'persistence exceedence': False, 'persistence non-exceedence': True}})[source]¶

This function calculates the averaged number of full windows for data -exceeding specific values during a specific duration (persistence exceedence) -non-exceeding specific values during a specific duration (persistence non-exceedence) Note: if a window overlaps to the next month/season/year, it is assumed to belong to the month/season/year when the window starts.

weighted_direction(Hs='Hs', drr='drr', args={'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'type': {'North hemishere(Summer/Winter)': False, 'North hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'North hemisphere moosoon(SW,NE,Hot season)': False, 'South hemisphere 4 seasons': False, 'South hemisphere(Summer/Winter)': True}})[source]¶

This function computes the energy weighted-dreiction based on input timeseries of Hs and Dir

workability(data1='data1', data2='data2', data3_optional='data3_optional', data4_optional='data4_optional', args={'Duration Min Res Max': [6, 6, 72], 'Threshold for each dataset:': [1, 10], 'Time blocking': {'Annual': True, 'Monthly': False, 'Seasonal (North hemisphere)': False, 'Seasonal (South hemisphere)': False}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'method': {'persistence exceedence': True, 'persistence non-exceedence': False}})[source]¶

This function provides workability persistence (non-)exceedence tables, i.e. the % of workable time based on 2 to 4 limiting paramters (e.g. Hs < 2m and Wind speed < 10 m/s)
